Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::Module###RocketChat::TicketRC
Setting.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the operation layer.

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::TicketRC###UsernameField
Setting.Description: Defines the field that hold the RocketChat username for Agent (for incoming TicketRC Generic Interface)

Setting.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::TicketRC###Token
Setting.Description: Defines the token value that will be send by Rocket Chat outgoing webhook (for incoming TicketRC Generic Interface)
